name: Cat Jam (Justin Ryder, ksib, fennyforealz)
description:
Work your way through various encounters to get yourself home! The path home isn’t always easy and you will be faced with various challenges and it is your goal to overcome them! Select a card, automatically randomized and drawn to your hand and roll to see the outcome of your action.

https://github.com/justinryder/gmtk-game-jam-2022
